text: The conducted study serves to three objectives. The first objective is to reveal the  values  duties  responsibilities  questions  values  loaded to the child by the child centric motherâ€™s attitude and the behavior about the effect of 5-6 aged nursery school children on the purchasing decision of the families who belong to high socio-economic class. The second objective is to  develop  measure  reduce  fix develop child centricity scale and the third objective is to examine the attitude and behavior differences between low child centric and high child centric mothers.  Including  Analyzing  Collecting  Providing  Analyzing  the data gathered from 257 mother respondents, the researchers have found out that the lowest influence of child upon the purchasing decision of the family are those which carry high purchasing risk and used by the whole family, whereas the highest influence of the child upon the purchasing decision of the family are the products with low risk and used by the whole family. Findings also reveal that there are statistically significant  correlations  differences  associations  similarities  differences  between the high child centricity and low child centricity mothers regarding the purchasing products that are highly risky and used by the whole family.
